text:
Lead Engineer

And Chill www.andchill.io

NYC (remote OK for a few months) Generous equity + salary

A smart movie bot designed to tell you what to watch as easily as asking a friend. We think about recommendations completely differently than anyone else, including MightyTV, Jinni, Netflix, etc.

Apply here or at jake@andchill.io. https://angel.co/andchill/jobs/88911-lead-engineer
